title: People are calling out those using #BoycottStarWarsVII
text:
People are calling out those using #BoycottStarWarsVII People are calling out those using #BoycottStarWarsVII 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
While most people seem to be on-the-edge-of-the-seat excited about the latest Star Wars film, there’s a group who aren’t impressed with the movie for one reason alone. 
They don’t like the prominence of black actors in the film which is due out later this year. 
The backlash comes less than 24 hours since the movie’s full-length trailer was released. 
This group, who we have to assume either have previously enjoyed the franchise or were keen to watch the film, are now boycotting the movie and encouraging others to do the same. The reason? They want to show their annoyance that a diverse range of actors has been used to play jedi, stormtroopers, ewoks, droids and wookies. 
WTF? #BoycottStarWarsVII may be one of the greatest trolling pranks in the history of Twitter. Someone somewhere is laughing very hard. 
— J. J. Robertson (@jamesjrobertson) October 19, 2015 
The main chatter on Twitter with people using the hashtag is not calling for the boycott, but the opposite, calling for a boycott of the boycott, if you like. 
People are mad crazy that the phrase exists and they are using their 140 characters to call out racism, explain why such a boycott makes no sense, for a whole heap of reasons, and share their general disbelief that some people have such opposing views. As a white American Male I would like to apologize for the stupidity of #BoycottStarWarsVII 
— Mason Wheeler (@wheelermason) October 19, 2015 Ok #BoycottStarWarsVII people; this is going to melt your brain, but you need to know…James Earl Jones voiced Vader & Lando is black. 
— Jeremy Jahns (@JeremyJahns) October 19, 2015 #BoycottStarWarsVII folks,Lemme get this straight:Wookies, Ewoks & Droids are fine but a BLACK PERSON is a problem?Go home.You're Drunk. 
— Audra McDonald (@AudraEqualityMc) October 19, 2015 so #boycottstarwarsvii is a thing because people are upset that a main character is black….….what? pic.twitter.com/dKY0G3KCMh
